page.title: 16WESTINGHOUSE,CHIPPENHAM
page.content: Westinghouse Brake and Signal Company Limited is based in{Chippenham alongside the railway station. It covers 52 acres of land. The firm started in 1894 as Westinghouse Foundry making brakes and signalling eqipment. Today what is known locally as 'Westinghouse' is really six companies involved in the making and the development of brakes,signals,and recrifers. The total workforce is 3000, and the firm is the largest single employer in the area. The products are used here in England and also exported to 49 countries around the world,including America and Australia.
